items.title: Intro to using Google Slides
items.headline: The first step to becoming a Google Slides pro
objectives_summary: In this course we will be building a basic presentation in Google Slides and learning the in's and out's of using the platform.  We will be discussing how to use Google Slide templates, how to add new elements to the template, how to find stock images to use, how to find stock icons, and much more.

items.title: Advanced Digital Photoshop Compositing - Combining 2 Images
items.headline: Advanced Compositing - With no experience or prior knowledge. Anyone can do it, all secrets & tricks will be revealed.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to photograph both images perfectly "In order to have a good starting point"
You will learn how to work with raw images and raw conversions
You will learn how to deep edge people from one image and merge them into another image " With a real look"
